creator: jp@physiol.med.vu.nl
text:
On the page "http://httpd.apache.org/docs/mod/mod_access.html" in the 
reference to "http://httpd.apache.org/docs/mod/core.html#satisfy", satisfy 
is misspelt as satsify.
N.B.
I couldn't select "trivial" as severity on the submission form.

The fix has been committed and the web site has been updated.

Thanks for your report, and thanks for using Apache!
creator: trawick@apache.org
